memberdef.name: CALL_DB_SERVER
memberdef.initializer: { \ bool retry_mac = true; \ long db_retries = 0; \ if (db_tg != NULL) \ { \ if (db_tg->is_svr_starting() == true) \ db_retries = DB_START_PHASE_RETRIES; \ } \ while (retry_mac == true) \ { \ try \ { \ RET = command_inout(NAME,SEND); \ retry_mac = false; \ } \ MANAGE_EXCEPT(NAME) \ } \ }

memberdef.name: CALL_DB_SERVER_NO_RET
memberdef.initializer: { \ bool retry_mac = true; \ long db_retries = 0; \ if (db_tg != NULL) \ { \ if (db_tg->is_svr_starting() == true) \ db_retries = DB_START_PHASE_RETRIES; \ } \ while (retry_mac == true) \ { \ try \ { \ command_inout(NAME,SEND); \ retry_mac = false; \ } \ MANAGE_EXCEPT(NAME) \ } \ }

memberdef.name: MANAGE_EXCEPT
memberdef.initializer: catch (Tango::CommunicationFailed &e) \ { \ if (e.errors.length() >= 2) \ { \ if (::strcmp(e.errors[1].reason.in(),"API_DeviceTimedOut") == 0) \ { \ if (db_retries != 0) \ { \ db_retries--; \ if (db_retries == 0) \ throw; \ } \ else \ throw; \ } \ else \ throw; \ } \ else \ throw; \ }
